items.name: enum HKElectrocardiogram.Classification
items.desc: Classifications returned by Apple Watch’s ECG algorithm.

items.name: var averageHeartRate: HKQuantity?
items.desc: The user’s average heart rate during the ECG.

items.name: var symptomsStatus: HKElectrocardiogram.SymptomsStatus
items.desc: A value that indicates whether the user entered a symptom when they recorded the ECG.

items.name: enum HKElectrocardiogram.SymptomsStatus
items.desc: Values indicating whether the user entered a symptom when they recorded the ECG.

items.name: var numberOfVoltageMeasurements: Int
items.desc: The number of voltage measurements associated with this sample.

items.name: var samplingFrequency: HKQuantity?
items.desc: The frequency at which the Apple Watch sampled the voltage.

items.name: class HKElectrocardiogram.VoltageMeasurement
items.desc: The voltage for all leads at a single point in time.

items.name: enum HKElectrocardiogram.Lead
items.desc: The lead used to record a voltage measurement.

items.name: let HKMetadataKeyAppleECGAlgorithmVersion: String
items.desc: A key for metadata indicating the version number of the algorithm Apple Watch uses to generate an ECG reading.

items.name: enum HKAppleECGAlgorithmVersion
items.desc: Version numbers for the algorithm Apple Watch uses to generate an ECG reading.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathECGClassification: String
items.desc: The key path for the sample’s classification.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathECGSymptomsStatus: String
items.desc: The key path for the sample’s symptom status.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathAverageHeartRate: String
items.desc: The key path for the sample’s average heart rate.
